Trojan detected in buddha.dll

Was about time. Works just fine.
For all the nubs, just disable your av. There's a false positive in buddha.dll
I can confirm this doesn't work on windows 8

just got it working in Windows 8.

Set compatibility to Windows 95, add Buddha.dll to AV exclusions.
